column1: Little Goat Diner////After looking forward to eating here for quite some time
column2: we left pretty disappointed. We had our two children with us and opted for the Little Goat over Girl & the Goat...and should have just opted for something else all together. We had reservations and did not have to wait for a table
column3: which was nice. Our waitress was a bit impatient
column4: asking us for a drink order before she shared the drink menu with us and later asking for our dinner order long before anyone would have had a chance to review the menu (and before she even brought the then-ordered drinks.) For our entire meal
column5: we got the very distinct impression that she was ready to turn our table and get another one in...which is understandable
column6: but few meals are enjoyed when you are being rushed.
